resources.string: I think I have enough potential to be useful for you. If you invested in me, I can promise to do my best, stay and grow with you.

I use Unity quite rarely, but I enjoy making games with it. I know how animations work, what are coliders. I know how to write scripts and basically make the game work. 
 	 * I have done one app with full Google Games Service 
 	 * Also I have worked with Vuforia plugin and made fun VR shooter game 
 	 * Of course, like many developers I love creating new games
Experience: about 9 months. Made games: 4 (one is fully available in Google Play Store)

"I have some knowledge of it because C# was my first Object Oriented programming language. I enjoy using Visual Studio as well as this language and I actually find it easy. 
 	 * I have real work experience with it 
 	 * I know about: 
 	 .NET 
 	 ASP.NET 
 	 MVC pattern "
Experience about 1 year. Made 5 applications (not published, but I could show them in the interview)
Where you can find all the information?
You can find everything in the Menu section

I am using Android Studio about 7 months now. I have made some apps which I can show you during the interview. The Android Studio is my strength and I like to use it very much. I know what layouts, adapters, holders, values files are and not only this. By the way, this app was also made with it. 
 	 * I know how to use gradle 
 	 * I understand why I need manifest 
 	 * I know about different screen adaptation 
 	 * Now I am interested in learning to use MVVM pattern 
 	 * I think about switching to Kotlin one day (I am now still using Java)
Experience: about 7 months.The apps made: more than 10 (fully completed)
"I believe you still have questions for me, so you can contact me with one of methods below: "

I always create some goals that make me to move forward. Iâ€™m not scared of trying out something new and unfamiliar. I am not only creating ideas, I am doing it. My strength at developing: create Android applications using Android Studio IDE.
What I am DOING right now?
Why am I writing for you?
In this section you can find the information about my experience
In this section you can find the information about me
I am currently studying VIKO EIF Smart Equipment Technologies. In my free time (and not only) I am learning to develop Android applications.

I may seem a little slow but I think this is just a matter of time and experience. I have theoretical knowledge about MVVM, MVC and similar design patterns, but I still have to deal with difficulties implementing them. The weakest part of my knowledge is React Native.

Programming and developing applications is my hobby, so the job where I can do these things would be meaningful time investment to me. I hope to be helpful for you and get the advantages from it myself, so it will be beneficial for both sides. Therefore, my main goal at the moment is a pleasant work, perhaps at your company.
I hope you understand that I am not yet a senior programmer, so I would always appreciate your help. This way we might achieve the perfection.
I have practiced at the IoT Teltonika Academy. Runtime - 270 hours. I have proof of it (a certificate).

While studying I have had two internships. I have been learning C# language since. I also have the theoretical knowledge about programming, design templates, program memory, Object Oriented Programing (OOP) and a lot more.
I have some experience with Google Play Console, App publishing, Updates.
I have some experience with Google Play Games services. One of the games is already available in Google Play Store

I am not using it a lot, because usually I work alone, but I would undoubtedly use an opportunity to work on bigger projects.
 	* I know how to push or clone projects 
 	* I do not face the difficulties with merging conflicts. 
 	* That is why I believe you could help me with bigger projects....
Experience: about 2 months. This is still quite new to me.

I am new at this JavaScript framework but I am surely excited to learn it and to know the basic structure of a project. 
 	 * I might seems slow, but I get things done 
 	 * I know how to use NPM 
 	 * I would like to learn it
